notes: MCP servers (RedNote, Gaode Maps) unavailable during research. Recommendations based on well-established shopping destinations. All locations should be verified for operating hours before visit. Budget allocation is conservative (¥1500 total) given minimal shopping requirements.

shopping.name: 钟书阁 (Zhongshuge Bookstore)
shopping.location: 芮欧百货, 南京西路1601号
shopping.notes: Famous 'most beautiful bookstore in China'. Has English section. Near hotel location. Open 10:00-22:00.

shopping.name: 泡泡玛特旗舰店 (POP MART Flagship)
shopping.location: TX淮海年轻力中心, 淮海中路523号
shopping.notes: Large POP MART flagship with exclusive releases. Perfect for girlfriend's interests. Open 10:00-22:00.

shopping.name: 新天地时尚购物区
shopping.notes: Upscale fashion boutiques, international brands, trendy stores. Great for quality fashion items. Mix of Chinese and Western brands.

shopping.name: 田子坊
shopping.notes: Artistic shopping area with unique boutiques, indie designers, cute accessories. Less touristy than expected.

shopping.name: 言几又书店
shopping.location: 大悦城北座, 西藏北路166号
shopping.notes: Modern lifestyle bookstore with English section, design items, cute stationery. Open 10:00-22:00.

shopping.name: PageOne书店 (三里屯店)
shopping.location: 三里屯太古里南区, 三里屯路19号
shopping.notes: Best English bookstore in Beijing. Large foreign language section. Modern design. Open 10:00-22:00.

shopping.name: 泡泡玛特 (POP MART 三里屯旗舰店)
shopping.notes: Large flagship store with exclusive toys. Same shopping area as PageOne for convenience.

shopping.name: The Bookworm
shopping.location: 朝阳区三里屯南街4号楼
shopping.notes: Iconic English bookstore + cafe. Great for browsing and coffee. Open 09:00-22:00. Cozy INFJ-friendly atmosphere.

shopping.name: 三里屯太古里 (Taikoo Li)
shopping.notes: Trendy shopping complex. International and Chinese fashion brands. Modern, young atmosphere.

shopping_tips: WeChat Pay and Alipay widely accepted, some stores take international cards
Bargaining not common in modern retail stores or malls
POP MART stores often have blind box exclusives - check release schedules
English bookstores may have limited stock, consider pre-ordering specific titles
Tax-free shopping available at some luxury stores for tourists (passport required)
Luggage capacity: Consider shipping items back if purchasing large items

location_clusters.shanghai_day5: 人民广场/南京西路区域 - bookstores and 泡泡玛特 within walking distance
location_clusters.shanghai_day7: 新天地/田子坊区域 - fashion and boutique shopping cluster
location_clusters.beijing_day14: 三里屯太古里 - all shopping locations within same complex or 5min walk

shanghai_bookstores: 久事书店 (Old China Hand Reading Room) - Shaoxing Road, strong English section
衡山·和集 - Hengshan Road, trendy lifestyle bookstore
beijing_bookstores: 老书虫 (The Bookworm) - listed above, cafe atmosphere
单向空间 (One Way Space) - Chinese focus but some English titles, very artistic
pop_mart_alternatives: MINISO (名创优品) - cute affordable items, multiple locations
